title: Inappropriate Question
transcript: Chri from Bangladesh assalam alikum she she I'm sorry for the inappropriate wordings of my question and begging pardon from you and our respective audiences uh my question is sh I had Haram relationship with my wife therefore call me on my mobile or get a counseling session if you can afford it if you can't you're entitled for one free counseling session if you're poor and we will discuss this inshallah privately
